column4: / designdream, have you peoples ever done a dualhead xgl setup?
I've been trying to find one that worked for me for months .. I read about them working great all the time .. but nothing so far for me .. just a nice lefty, and a gray righty ..
that doesnt give me much hope of getting my quadruple display going :(
Not really .. I've got enough monitors to pull that one off, just not enough vid cards ..
